jobDescription:
Role: Software Developer, C++
 
Team is responsible for acquiring data from the CT scanner and reconstructing CT images. Involves developing
algorithms and high performance computing on GPUs. Product uses Linux operating systems.  Mostly using C++ and
OpenCL for development.
 
Team: 17 engineers onsite, have global teams onsite.
 
Skills requirement: Experience with C++ and exposure to Linux.  GPU processing (for ex. CUDA is a plus)
  
Degree: Prefers computer science or computer engineering.  Biomedical engineering would be acceptable if there is good
programming experience.
 
Background info:  We are responsible for CT Image reconstruction, which involves high performance computing, algorithm
development and performance optimization. 
 
Job description:
The team developing The Company's industry leading CT scanners is looking for highly motivated software engineers to join
them to develop the next generation of CT scanners.
Software Engineers will be working on CT image reconstruction team using state-of-the-art “compute” and
software platforms.
 
In this role you will:
·         Participate in developing and testing CT image reconstruction software, utilizing latest high-performance
computing hardware (GPGPU/multicore CPU) and software technologies
·         Experimenting with emerging high performance computing technologies to optimize CT algorithm
performance
·         Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate CT image reconstruction algorithms into product
software

 
Required qualifications:
·         C++, Linux OS, Familiarity with OOP, design patterns,
·         Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 

Desired qualifications:
·         Familiarity with GPU technologies.  CUDA and/or OpenCL
·         Familiarity with python and Linux shell scripting
·         Strong math background
